Package com.xebisco.yield

Class AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.YldB
com.xebisco.yield.Component
com.xebisco.yield.AudioPlayer
public class AudioPlayer extends Component
It's a class that plays audio clips.

      Parameters:

      multiThread - This is a boolean value that determines whether the audio clip will be loaded in a separate thread.
